articles.title: Adobe launches a Photoshop iPhone app - TechCrunch
articles.description: Adobe announced on Tuesday that it's bringing its popular design and editing software Photoshop to mobile, starting with iOS.
articles.content:
Adobe announced on Tuesday it’s bringing its popular design and editing software Photoshop to mobile, starting with iOS. The company plans to launch a Photoshop for Android app later this year.
